name: rfc4122
description: JavaScript implementation of RFC4122: A Universally Unique IDentifier (UUID) URN Namespace

scripts.build: babel rfc4122.js > rfc4122.es5.js && browserify rfc4122.es5.js > rfc4122.browserify.js && cat devTools\LICENSE.js > rfc4122.browserify.min.js && minify rfc4122.browserify.js >> rfc4122.browserify.min.js
scripts.release-patch: npm run build && git add -A . && git commit -m "Release Patch Build" && npm version patch -m "Release Patch v%s" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release-minor: npm run build && git add -A . && git commit -m "Release Minor Build" && npm version minor -m "Release Minor v%s" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release-major: npm run build && git add -A . && git commit -m "Release Major Build" && npm version major -m "Release Major v%s" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
